content:
Based on very rough measurements (just running time cargo build with and without the option enabled), my build is about 16% (5 seconds) faster with split-debuginfo=unpacked enabled. I've noticed in the past that rustc seems to spend a while running dsymutil when compiling my project, so it makes sense that this feature makes my build faster.

Thank you so much for implementing this!
Since it's only stable on macOS, should I enable it in .cargo/config.toml?
It will be enabled by default on macOS in cargo: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9298
Great! But until the next release, where should I put the config?
